dublin_core.dcvalue: Panel Building on Local Capacity and Sustainability There is an urgent need for local software developers to support digital health platforms in low resource countries But how can the digital health community design projects that can attract and retain high quality software developers and other technologists to work on digital health platforms This session will showcase successes and failures of global digital health experts in their attempts to build local teams of software developers and ICT experts Presented by Rebecca Saxton Fox ICT4D Advisor USAID
Building on Local Capacity and Sustainability
